InstallationÂ¶

Install via pip:

pip install django-ccthumbs

Import the field inside your models.py and assign it to an attribute just like you would with a normal django file.

from django.conf import settings
from ccthumbs.fields import ImageWithThumbsField


class SomeModel(models.Model):
    img = ImageWithThumbsField(
                upload_to='somemodel/%Y/%m/%d',
                sizes=settings.CCTHUMBS_SIZES)

where settings.CCTHUMBS_SIZES is a tuple of tuples, each of which contains a width and a height

CCTHUMBS_SIZES = (
        (200,200),
        (640, 480),
        (1200, 960)
)
